branchCategory.name: ZSE1, Vacuum Switch, Single Mount or for ZM Vacuum Generator
branchCategory.description: <p>ZSE1 is a basic vacuum switch with digital output and optional analog voltage output.  The ZSE1 monitors vacuum level down to -101 kPa.  ZSE1 can be mounted in a ZM vacuum generator system, or by metric or NPTF male threads.  Rotary trimmers adjust the switch set point and variable hysteresis if 1 output, or two set point trimmers if 2 output.  A red/green LED indicator also lights when the output signal in ON. Electrical connections include a 3 wire grommet cable or 4 wire snap-in connector.  ZSE1 is CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP40 enclosure rating.</p>

breadCrumb.name: ZSE1, Vacuum Switch, Single Mount or for ZM Vacuum Generator
